{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
Six numbers pronounced with the first tone to the ninth tone respectively in Cantonese: 3, 9, 4, 0, 5, 2, 7, 8, 6.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|c=saam1 gau2 sei3 ling4 ng5 ji6 cat1 baat3 luk6
|cat=ph
}}

===Phrase===
{{zh-phrase}}

# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} {{non-gloss definition|A phrase used to memorise the nine tones in Cantonese}}

====Usage notes====
The seventh, eighth and ninth tones have the same tone contour as the first, third and sixth tones respectively, but they are {{w|Checked tone|checked syllables}}.
